actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the policy of the Congress that the performance of the functions of the Federal Government should be attained by use of its own manpower and not by means of contracts with the private sector.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that functions of the Federal Government should be performed by employment of its own manpower and not by contracts with the private sector.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the policy of the Congress that the performance of the functions of the Federal Government should be attained by use of its own manpower and not by means of contracts with the private sector.
